title: The World's FASTEST USB Drive Has a Problem.....
description: The Western Digital Black P50 Game Drive uses the new USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 interface, making it capable of speeds up to 20Gbps.  That makes it technically one of the fastest USB drives in the world but during testing we came across a few problems.        Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  WD Black P50 -  SanDisk Extreme Pro -  Gdrive TB3 -  RoG STRIX Arion -  WD Black SSD -   Razer Deathadder V2 -   Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Western Digital. This video is sponsored by Razer's Deathadder V2. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------   #wdblackp50 #fastestusbdrive  #hardwarecanucks
